dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Gallagher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: Cora is a citation network dataset where scientific publications are represented as nodes and their citation relationships as edges. The node features are described by a sparse bag-of-words feature vector.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Gallagher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: Citeseer is a citation network dataset similar to Cora, where scientific publications are represented as nodes and their citation relationships as edges. The node features are described by a sparse bag-of-words feature vector.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: P. Sen

dcterms:description: Pubmed is a citation network dataset where scientific publications are represented as nodes and their citation relationships as edges. The node features are described by a sparse bag-of-words feature vector.
dcterms:title: Pubmed
